text:
Please consider adding a prefix parameter to the loadproperties task.  This 
parameter would do the same thing as the prefix in the properties task.

If you don't want to add another parameter, please add a note in the 
documentation saying that "prefixlines" can be added to the filterchain as a 
work-around.
creator: gjfdh@yahoo.com

text: Documentation now points to prefixlines filter.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
